name: Scratch Kickball
description:
Hold Z until you have enough power, then let go to kick the ball! It's that simple! If you have 100 Kick Power, you get a Perfect! If you have 0 kick power, you get a miss.
Also on scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/606620145

Secrets: You can click and hold the ball on the main screen to make it spin. Ball Rave makes the ball rainbow (Settings) (Epilepsy Warning) You can kill the Scratch Cat by clicking him. (Doing this you will have to restart the game.) Notes: If there are any bugs/things I forgot to fix, let me know! If you want to play the game without changing the global score, you can play without an account
  1. Credits:
  2. Songs and Assets from Scratch's Library.
  3. Coding and Animation by Me.
  4. Update: Added small click animation.
  5. Update: Fixed Change Song menu
